leve.name: Secondhand Smoke Screen (L)
leve.description: A Temple Knight commander reports from the field that he has developed an unusual cough, surely an inflammation from breathing the noisome mists that rise from land during a battle. The root of the rubycress plant is just what his ailment requires, yet he knows not where to procure the plant. I would pay you to go and harvest handfuls of the stuff.
leve.client: Temple Knights Hospitalier Captain Abel Whitecape
